list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the sensation of flavor perceived in the mouth and throat on contact with a substance.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the wine had a fruity taste
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Rượu có một hương vị trái cây

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a person's liking for particular flavors.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: this pudding is too sweet for my taste
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Bánh pudding này quá ngọt ngào cho hương vị của tôi

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the ability to discern what is of good quality or of a high aesthetic standard.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she has awful taste in literature
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô ấy có hương vị khủng khiếp trong văn học

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: perceive or experience the flavor of.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she had never tasted ice cream before
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô chưa bao giờ nếm kem trước đây
